dataset_id: BOREAS Follow-On HMet-04 1996-1998 NSA Meteorological Data
title: BOREAS Follow-On HMet-04 1996-1998 NSA Meteorological Data
summary: As part of the BOREAS Follow-on, an extended period of data collection was supported in the NSA because of the continued efforts at the NSA-OBS site.  This data set contains near-surface meteorological data collected and averaged over 15 minute intervals from two sites in the NSA, the SRC tower at the Thompson airport (YTH) and a temporary walkup wooden tower at the Old Black Spruce (OBS) tower site.
